title: Newly Remodeled 3 Bedroom Townhome in Beautiful Campbell Neighborhood
posting_body: Fall in love with this cozy 3 bedroom in Campbell that is close to complete with a full renovation!
Another wonderful rental opportunity is available in Campbell right off of San Tomas Aquino and just minutes to Downtown Campbell and Los Gatos.
The address is 1143 Smith Ave Unit C. Feel free to drive by and call us if you would like to set up an appointment to tour.
Here are some specifics:
- Approximately 1700 square feet
- First Story with 1 bedroom and full bath downstairs
- Second story with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, and laundry room
- Wood-burning fireplace
- Eat-in kitchen with refrigerator, dishwasher and stove
- Nice wrap around yard w/ HUGE amount of space
- 1-car detached garage ideal for additional storage
- Owner pays for water
- Located on a quiet residential street in a serene community
- Pets ok with additional deposit - restrictions apply.
- Deposit equal to one months rent
- Campbell Union School District
Apply online today: <URL>
- Non-Refundable $45 application fee per person.
*Credit Screening Required*
- Applicant must submit proof of gross income (2.5x monthly rent)
- Deposit is equal to one month’s rent on approved credit
To schedule a private tour please contact Forbes Group at
show contact info
or email leasing @ forbesgrouppm .
com
All the Best,
